sourcesContent:
Hello world

Build a Simple Web App with Express & Angular

The below message is fetched from the express backend

{{ message.message }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from './api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'frontEnd'; message: any; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { }; ngOnInit() { this.apiService.getMessage().subscribe(data => { this.message = data; }); } }
